name: A Fading Dream
description:
IF YOU LIKE THIS GAME VOTE FOR IT AT:

http://contest.gamedevfort.com/submission/226#.VcU...

[TW: Suicide, Blood.]

|FEATURES|

-Start out proposing to your girlfriend!

-Be a ranger and help out people on quests!

-Experience an unique story about love.

-Hand Drawn art and Pixel art made by the creator of this game (Zaprong)

|GAMEPLAY|

-It's a 2D RPG game made with the RPG Maker VX Ace engine

-This game has been built around with the twist: GROWTH

in mind so look forward to it.

-Likewise, this game is short because of the way it was built around

(1 hour limit). I strongly believe this game takes 1 hour on average!

|OTHER|

-This game has been finished between 7/19/2015 and 8/5/2015 (18 Days total) and took a total

of 135 hours to complete (According to the Steam timer).

-Though this game is finished, bugs and typos might be corrected.

-Engine aside, this was a One-Man project, hopefully I delivered a good game.

-This was my first attempt at a serious project in this engine, so

constructive critique will be accepted.

|DOWNLOADS|

-RTP for RPG Maker VX Ace (Required to run the game).

http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages#rpg-maker-vx-ace

-The game is on the green "Download Now!" button at the side of the screenshots.

(It doesn't contain the RTP, so if you don't have it, you need yo download the RTP)
